Detailed Description

A subclass of AlertBox that can display a date picker area.

The following example demonstrates how to use the DatePickerBox. 

  //Create your DatePickerBox in your page
  SamplePage : public Page {
    public:
      DatePickerBox* mpDatePickerBox;
      int32_t mYear;
      int32_t mMonth;
      int32_t mDay;
      SamplePage();
      virtual ~SamplePage();
      virtual void onInit(Persistence* p);
      virtual void onTear();
      void createDatePickerBox();
  };

  SamplePage::createDatePickerBox() {
    // initial member
    mYear = 2012;
    mMonth = DatePickerBox::MONTH_JAN;
    mDay = 1;

    // new DatePickerBox instance
    mpDatePickerBox = new DatePickerBox(this);

    if (mpDatePickerBox != NULL) {
      // set DatePickerBox cancelable
      mpDatePickerBox->setCancelable(true);

      // update date picker
      mpDatePickerBox->updateDate(mYear, mMonth, mDay);

      // showing DatePickBox
      Scene* scene = getSceneSingleton();
      if (scene != NULL) {
        scene->showDialog(mpDatePickerBox);
      }
    }
  }
